ARABIC: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تُلْهِكُمْ أَمْوَٰلُكُمْ وَلَآ أَوْلَٰدُكُمْ عَن ذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَن يَفْعَلْ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْخَٰسِرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You who have iman! do not let your wealth or children divert you from the remembrance of Allah. Whoever does that is lost.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: O you who believe, let not your wealth and children make you negligent of the remembrance of God. Those who do so will be losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Believers, let your possessions and your offspring not make you negligent of Allah's remembrance. For whoso does that, they will be the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Believers, do not let your wealth and children divert you from remembering God. Wwhoever is diverted will suffer a great loss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: O People who Believe! May not your wealth or your children cause you to neglect the remembrance of Allah; and whoever does this – so it is they who are in a loss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: O you who believe! Let not your properties or your children divert you from the remembrance of Allah. And whosoever does that, then they are the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: O you who believe! let not your wealth, or your children, divert you from the remembrance of Allah; and whoever does that, these are the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: O believers, let not your possessions neither your children divert you from God's remembrance; whoso does that, they are the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: O ye who believe! Let not your wealth nor your children distract you from remembrance of Allah. Those who do so, they are the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: O believers! Do not let your wealth or your children distract you from remembrance of God. Those who do so will be the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: O ye who believe let not your riches or your children divert you from the remembrance of Allah. And whosoever doth that then those! they are the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: O you who have faith! Do not let your possessions and children distract you from the remembrance of Allah, and whoever does that—it is they who are the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: O ye who believe! Let not your riches or your children divert you from the remembrance of Allah. If any act thus, the loss is their own.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: O you who believe! Let not your properties or your children divert you from the remembrance of Allah. And whosoever does that, then they are the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Believers, do not let either your possessions or your children divert you from the Remembrance of Allah. Those who do that shall be the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: O you who believe! Let neither your possessions nor your children distract you from the remembrance of God. Whoever does that—these are the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: O you who have believed, let not your wealth and your children divert you from remembrance of Allah. And whoever does that - then those are the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [63:9] O you who believe, do not let your possessions and your children divert you, distract you, from the remembrance of God, [from] the five prayers; for whoever does that — it is they who are the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Here the story of Zayd Ibn Arqam is also mentioned (0 ye who believe) in Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an! (Let not your wealth) in Mecca (nor your children) also in Mecca (distract you from remembrance of Allah) from migration and jihad. (Those who do so) whoever is distracted by his wealth and children from migrating and striving, (they are the losers) who will face punishment.
